অ ১:
(noun) the written form of the first vowel sound and 1st letter of the Bengali alphabet. Unlike other vowels অ has no shortened sign (like া ি ী). অ-আ, অ-আ-ক-খ (noun(s)) 
1 the letters of the Bengali alphabet. 
2 elementary knowledge; the rudiments of learning; ABC: ব্যাকরণের অ-আ-ক-খ.
অ ২: (prefix) used before (noun(s)), (adjective(s)) and (adverb(s)), it indicates negation, absence, want, shortage, contrariety,  and hostility (eg অবাঙালি, অকারণ, অযত্ন, অপরিণত, অঘাট, অধর্ম) and is equivalent to various negative prefixes in English, ie, non-, un-, il-, im-, in-, ir-, dis-, mis-, etc; when prefixed by a word beginning with a vowel, অ is replaced by অন, eg অ+অভিজ্ঞ = অনভিজ্ঞ, অ + ঐক্য=অনৈক্য, অ+ঊর্বর = অনূর্বর, etc.
অংশ:
(noun) 1 portion or piece of a whole; a section; a constituent or organic part: দেহের অর্ধাংশ (অর্ধ+অংশ); যন্ত্রের অংশ (যন্ত্রাংশ); শহরের পশ্চিমাংশ (পশ্চিম+অংশ); সমাজের বুদ্ধিজীবী অংশ, the intellectual section of the society. 
2 an incomplete portion; a fragment or decimal fraction: ভগ্নাংশ
(ভগ্ন+অংশ) (1/5, 0.20). 
3 a region or geographical division: পার্বত্য অংশ.
4 a share or allotment: সম্পত্তির অংশ, কারবারের অংশ. 
5 (geography) 1/360th part of the earth’s circumference; a degree: অক্ষের অংশ (অক্ষাংশ).
6 (astrology) 1/12th part or one of the 12 signs of the zodiac: রাশিচক্রের অংশ (রাশি). 
7 begetting power of male deities: অবতার দেবতার অংশে জাত, an Avatara is begotten/born of a god.
8 incarnation or personation: বিষ্ণুর অংশ রূপে ধরাধামে আবির্ভূত, incarnation of Vishnu on earth. 
9 point(s) of consideration; any aspect(s) of something: কোনো কোনো অংশে, in some respects. 
অংশক (noun)(algebra) fractional part of a logarithm; a mantissa; a kinsman; a day. 
অংশ করা (verb intransitive), (verb transitive) divide into parts or shares; distribute. 
অংশগত (adjective) included in the rightful or inherited share; relating to a share or portion. 
অংশগ্রহণ (noun) taking part; participation. 
অংশগ্রহণ করা (verb intransitive), (verb transitive) take part/participate (in). 
অংশগ্রাহী (adjective) taking a share; sharing; participating. 
(noun)  co-sharer; Shareholder; participant; a party. 
অংশত (adverb) in part; partly; partially: অংশত দায়ী. 
অংশন (noun) act of dividing/apportioning; apportionment. 
অংশনামা (noun) a deed of partition. 
অংশনীয় (adjective) divisible into parts or shares; to be divided. 
অংশভাগী (adjective) having a claim to a share; entitled to a share.
অংশাংশ:
(noun) 1 fraction of a share.
 2 different shares.
অংশাংশি, অংশা-অংশি:
(noun) division into respective shares.    
(adverb) according to respective shares; part by part.
অংশানো: (verb intransitive) (verb transitive) descend/devolve on as an inheritance.
অংশিত: (adjective) divided into parts or shares; partitioned.
অংশী:
(adjective) constituted (or composed) of parts.
(noun) 1 one who shares (the sorrows of) or feels (pity for): আমার দুঃখের অংশী. 
2 an associate in business or ownership; partner; co-sharer; shareholder; party; participant. 
অংশীদার (noun) one having a share in a property or business. 
অংশীদারি (noun) partnership. 
(adjective) relating to partnership.
অংশু:
(noun) 1 ray of light; beam; glow.  
2 a fine fibre. 
অংশুক (noun) piece of cloth; fine cloth. 
অংশুপট্ট (noun) silk cloth. 
অংশুময়ী (adjective) (feminine) dazzling; luminous; radiant. 
অংশুময় mas. 
অংশুমালী (noun) the sun.
(adjective) blazing; luminous. 
অংশুল (adjective) having rays; full of rays; radiant. 
অংশুশিরা (noun) animal having arteries spread all over from one centre like the sun rays; rayed animal; the radiata.
অংশ্যমান: (adjective) in the process of being divided.
অংস:
(noun) the joint by which the arms are connected with the body;  the shoulder. 
অংসকুট, অংসকূট (noun) the hunch on the shoulder of a bull; bull’s hump.  
অংসত্র (noun) protective covering for the upper part of the body worn by soldiers in former times; coat of mail. 
অংস ফলক, অংস ফলকাস্থি (noun(s)) (anatomy) the shoulder-blade; the scapula. 
অংস ভার (noun) 1 the load or burden on the shoulder.
2 (figurative) being accountable; duty; responsibility. 
অংসল (adjective) having massive or robust shoulders; broad-shouldered 
অংসলা (feminine)
অকচ:
(adjective) having no or not much hair on the scalp; bald; bald-headed.
অকচা (feminine) = অকচ .
অকঠোর:
(adjective) 1 not harsh or severe; mild.
2 easy; simple.
অকথন:
(adjective) what cannot be explained or expressed in words; inexplicable: অকথন বেদন. 
(noun) abusive, unjust or obscene utterance.
অকথনীয়: (adjective) not proper to say; unseemly or indecent to speak.
অকথা:
(noun) abusive, indecent or filthy language
(also অকথা-কুকথা).
অকথিত: (adjective) unspoken; not pronounced, disclosed or revealed.
অকথ্য:
(adjective) unutterable; unseemly or improper to say: অকথ্য খবর; beyond expression in words: অকথ্য যন্ত্রণা. 
অকথ্য-কথন (noun) improper utterance; abusive Words; revile.
(adjective) indescribable; inexpressible.
অকনিষ্ঠ: (adjective) without a younger or the youngest son/brother.
অকন্টক:
(adjective) 1 thornless; with no pricks. 
2 (figurative) free from troubles or obstacles; safe and peaceful. 
অকণ্টকে (adverb) without let or hindrance; in peace and safety.
অকপট:
(adjective) frank; open; sincere; free from angularities; candid; unreserved. 
অকপটতা (noun) frankness; candour. 
অকপটে (adverb) frankly;
without hiding anything. 
অকপট-চিত্ত (adjective) open-hearted; simple-natured; frank. 
অকপট চিত্তে  (adverb) open heartedly; frankly; freely; sincerely.
অকবি: (noun), (adjective) one without the genius of a poet; not fit to be called a poet.
অকমনীয়:
(adjective) 1 not to be wished for; undesirable; unwelcome. 
2 ungraceful; uncouth; ugly.
অকম্প, অকম্পিত, অকম্প্র:
(adjective) not tremulous or timorous; steady; undaunted; unmoved; unperturbed. 
অকম্পনীয় (adjective) not affected by tremors; not sensitive to shaking.
অকর:
(adjective) 1 (of landed estate) rent-free; free-hold; not-liable to taxes. 
2 having no hands; handless; armless. 
3 without a ray of light; having no radiation.
অকরণ:
(noun) 1 state of being inactive; inactivity; inaction; indolence. 
2 illegal act; improper action. 
অকরণী (noun) (mathematics) rational quantity; a quantity commensurable with natural numbers, eg, √81=9. 
অকরণীয় (adjective) what should not be done; not becoming to do. 
অকরণীয় ঘর (noun) a family not acceptable or suitable for matrimonial alliance.
অকরুণ: (adjective) lacking in/not showing kindness; unkind; merciless; cruel.
